patterns.name: Microservices
patterns.description: Microservices architecture with multiple independent services

patterns.name: REST API
patterns.description: RESTful API architecture using HTTP methods and resources

patterns.name: Single Page Application (SPA)
patterns.description: Single page application with client-side routing and state management

recommendations: Sanitize user inputs to prevent XSS
Consider implementing layered architecture for better organization
Consider component-based architecture for better reusability
Implement proper component hierarchy and state management
Consider using React hooks for state management
